reviewText: One of my favorite movies.  I never thought i would find in in DVD

I really enjoyed this movie. Shelley Long plays a good part in this movie. It kept my interest. I would watch it again. It surprised me this movie> I thought it might be lousy movie but it was a good entertaining movie. Serious as well as being funny.
Like the movie Honeymoon for Mom, this movie is very enjoyable.  Shelly Long should make more movies like this.would recommend it.
This movie was a delight, as always Shelly Long will provide much entertainment to any viewer.

I remember falling in love with this film when it first aired on TV several years ago.  I taped it then, and wore out my tape watching it.  I was thrilled to see it on DVD, so I bought it.  I hadn't seen it in years, but it was as good as I remembered it.

Delane Matthews and Mel Harris each give wonderful performances, as does Ian Ziering.  This movie is just fun to watch!

Shelley Long is amazing though!  This movie made me remember why I used to love her so much.  She is hilarious!  Her character is such fun to watch.

I highly reccomend this movie to people looking for some laughs.  Especially if you have some fond memories of Shelley Long.

We ordered this movie thinking it might provide some nice entertainment and found it so delightful we watched it a second time the next night. Picture three "over the hill" gals amidst spring break in Florida. Filmed in the San Diego area, it depicts three latethirtysome ladies in a funk that somehow get their zest for life back after all of the madcap  twists and turns in the movie. Mel Harris has never been lovlier and Shelley Long, although more wrinkled, still has that brightly expressive face. For men, there's lots of scantily clad bikini babes in many of the shots and for women, it's a great, feel good romp and the three lady stars get their respective romantic due. Go for it!
